Shopping

Like Follow

Where to get Nintendo Switch bundles on sale for Black Friday

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Rudie ObiasMashable Deals2018-11-23 12:48:50 UTC

With Black Friday finally here after an enjoyable Thanksgiving, we're rounding up the best deals on Nintendo Switch bundles from top retailers like Amazon, Walmart, Best Buy, and more.

If you're looking to give the Nintendo Switch to friends and family for the holiday season, we have deals on consoles that'll give them something extra: an additional game like Fortnite and Mario Kart 8 Deluxe. We also have deals on bundles that include accessories and an extra Joy-Con controllers, as well as discounts on the console itself. There are also deals on games and microSD cards, so you can get the most out of it.

SEE ALSO: All the best Black Friday 2018 sales, right in one place

The Nintendo Switch is one of the most popular video game consoles for novice and advanced gamers alike, so we gathered deals for everyone who just wants to experience the best in gaming with Nintendo. 

Here's where you can find the best deals on Nintendo Switch bundles:

Nintendo Switch bundles

  • Nintendo Switch System with Mario Kart 8 Deluxe — $299.99 (list price $359.98) Also available at Amazon, Walmart, and Best Buy.

  • Nintendo Switch - Grey Joy-Con Console & Accessories Bundle — $322.98 (list price $324.97)

  • Nintendo Switch 32GB Console with Neon Blue and Neon Red Joy-Con — $259.99 (list price $299.99)

  • Nintendo Switch Console with Neon Blue and Red Joy-Con with $50 GameStop Gift Card — $299.99 (list price $349.99)

  • Nintendo Switch Fortnite Double Helix Bundle — $299.99 (list price $329.99)

  • Nintendo 2DS System with Super Mario Maker — $79.99 (list price $139.99)

Accessories and games on sale

  • Nintendo Switch accessories up to 40% off

  • SanDisk - 64GB microSDXC Memory Card for Nintendo Switch — $17.99 (list price $79.99)

  • Select Nintendo Switch games for $20 off

More coverage: Black Friday 2018

  • Black Friday 2018: All the best deals are right here

  • Shopping tips and tactics for Black Friday 2018

  • Amazon: Shop sales on Fire tablets, Echo Spot, and more

  • Walmart: Shop sales on Xbox One S, Instant Pot, Nintendo Switch

  • Smart home deals: Amazon Echo, Roomba, Google Home, Apple HomePod

  • Instant Pot deals: Where to get the cheapest price

  • Clothing deals and promo codes: J.Crew, Macy's, Kohl's, Nordstrom, Lord &Taylor
